Job Resume.description: Supported digital banking transformation projects. Led a data analytics bootcamp for 25 consultants and helped structure a $1.5B green bond portfolio redesign.
Led early-stage product strategy, customer discovery, and pricing A/B tests. Pivoted product positioning to achieve $132K ARR by month 2.
Launched a GenAI feature for video encoding workflows, aligned engineering and GTM stakeholders, and wrote PRDs for analytics and pricing features.
Built a supply-chain forecasting simulator in Python, scaled distributed inference across 410 nodes, and projected $27.7 M in annual savings.
